pullRequest.title: Fix Jormungand's prison task location for the Slayer Plugin
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description

Fix #11104. The solution is to add an entry to the SlayerTaskPlugin's Task whitelist.

Testing

 Added unit tests.
 I verified the behavior locally with the debugger.

commit.message: add to whitelist and add unit tests

nodes.bodyText: Is this meant to throw IOException?
This var name should be changed as well. It should become TASK_CHECKSLAYERGEM_KONAR_2 and move next to that line earlier in the file.
Why is this validating that the chat message manager is making changes here? This is not testing the right behavior. Instead, this should be similar to testCheckSlayerGemKonarTask().
